description: Turning your dad's jeans into profit.
teaser: Turning your dad's jeans into profit.
contentencoded:
Making something new from something old. Marlow Fox is a denim designer at the Gap, Jeff Garza is a veteran of the war in Iraq. 

Together, they've built a new business called Fox Hole, and a second life of sorts for very well-loved clothes.

It all started with Jeff's dad's old Levis.

title: Something new from something blue
